page.title: 11LOCAL SURVEY CONT.
page.content: {DOES ANYONE IN YOUR HOUSEHOLD SMOKE? Yes:26 No:13 {IF SO,WHAT KIND OF THING? Cigarettes:18 Cigars:7 Pipe:7 {DOES ANYONE IN YOUR HOUSEHOLD SUFFER {FROM HAYFEVER? Yes:16 No:23 {WHICH LOCAL PAPER DO YOU HAVE? Mid Sussex Times:31 Evening Argus:2 W.Sussex County Times:5 {DO YOU HAVE A SUNDAY PAPER? Yes:32 No:8 {DO YOU GO TO YOUR LOCAL CHURCH? Never:19 Sometimes:18 Regularly:4 {HOW MANY CARS ARE THERE IN YOUR HOUSE? One:13 Two:20 Three:6 Or more:3 {WHAT FUEL DO YOU COOK WITH? Gas:3 Electricity:33 Others:10 {ARE THERE ANY VEGETARIANS IN YOUR {HOUSE?}Yes:4 No:38 {DO YOU EVER BAKE BREAD OR CAKES? Sometimes:20 Never:4 A lot:14
